name: Code Documentation Static js Agent
shortDescription: Generates documentation for all JavaScript files located in the static/js directory.
fullDescription: This agent creates a Staticjs.md file that documents all scripts found within the static/js folder. It autonomously lists the JavaScript files and produces a comprehensive markdown file, saving it automatically without user intervention.
UseCases: Ideal for projects needing clear documentation of frontend scripts, ensuring developers have an organized reference of all JavaScript functionalities.
